## EntityManager.deleteMany() method

删除多个

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteMany(entityClassName: string, params?: object): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entityClassName | string | 实体类名 |
|  params | object | _(Optional)_ 条件参数，参考findOne |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

成功:true，失败:false
